root.string: An error occurred when entering your game session! (%s)
Your attempt to connect to the game timed out!
Your version is different to the host's version. {cr}Please make sure that everyone uses the latest version of the game.
Your attempt to connect to the host of your new game has failed.{cr}This might be caused by restrictive NAT settings in your or your peer's router.
Your attempt to connect to a player in your new game has failed.{cr}This might be caused by restrictive NAT settings in your or your peer's router.
Your request to join the game has been rejected. {cr}The session you were trying to connect to is either full or has already started.
Your attempt to connect to the host of your new game has failed.

string.Comments: KoBo: If there's a Deliver quest with a time limit, the quest button on the left screen border shows a timer. When the player has sent carts for this quest, the time is on hold.{cr}The word "Sent" is displayed instead.

Your diligence, dedication, and hard work have been rewarded!{cr}{cr}On this date, by virtue of the power invested in me, I hereby proclaim your promotion to {cr}{cr}SHERIFF{cr}{cr}with all attendant benefits and responsibilities. {cr}{cr}Best of luck with the new title!

Your eye for detail and personal zeal have not gone unnoticed by the Crown!{cr}{cr}On this date, by virtue of the power invested in me, I hereby proclaim your promotion to {cr}{cr}BARON{cr}{cr}with all attendant benefits and responsibilities. {cr}{cr}Keep up the good work!

Your achievements demand proper recognition by the Throne!{cr}{cr}On this date, by virtue of the power invested in me, I hereby proclaim your promotion to {cr}{cr}COUNT{cr}{cr}with all attendant benefits and responsibilities. {cr}{cr}May your fortunes never falter!

Your dedication to both the Settlers and your Liege are hearby and heartily recognised by your Majesty!{cr}{cr}On this date, by virtue of the power invested in me, I hereby proclaim your promotion to {cr}{cr}MARQUIS{cr}{cr}with all attendant benefits and responsibilities. {cr}{cr}I am delighted by your progress!

Your August Majesty wishes the world to know of your achievements and to reward them properly!{cr}{cr}On this date, by virtue of the power invested in me, I hereby proclaim your promotion to {cr}{cr}DUKE{cr}{cr}with all attendant benefits and responsibilities. {cr}{cr}You are an invaluable part of our kingdom!

On this most solemn occasion, the Crown wishes to bestow the ultimate rank of nobility upon a most worthy candidate!{cr}{cr}On this date, by virtue of the power invested in me, I gladly proclaim your promotion to {cr}{cr}ARCHDUKE{cr}{cr}with all attendant benefits and responsibilities. {cr}{cr}The success of our Kingdom and our Settlers would be impossible without you!

On this most solemn occasion, the Crown wishes to bestow the ultimate rank of nobility upon a most worthy candidate!{cr}{cr}On this date, by virtue of the power invested in me, I gladly proclaim your promotion to {cr}{cr}ARCHDUCHESS{cr}{cr}with all attendant benefits and responsibilities. {cr}{cr}The success of our Kingdom and our Settlers would be impossible without you!

Your eye for detail and personal zeal have not gone unnoticed by the Crown!{cr}{cr}On this date, by virtue of the power invested in me, I hereby proclaim your promotion to {cr}{cr}BARONESS{cr}{cr}with all attendant benefits and responsibilities. {cr}{cr}Keep up the good work!

Your August Majesty wishes the world to know of your achievements and to reward them properly!{cr}{cr}On this date, by virtue of the power invested in me, I hereby proclaim your promotion to {cr}{cr}DUCHESS{cr}{cr}with all attendant benefits and responsibilities. {cr}{cr}You are an invaluable part of our kingdom!

Your achievements demand proper recognition by the Throne!{cr}{cr}On this date, by virtue of the power invested in me, I hereby proclaim your promotion to {cr}{cr}COUNTESS{cr}{cr}with all attendant benefits and responsibilities. {cr}{cr}May your fortunes never falter!

Your dedication to both the Settlers and your Liege are hearby and heartily recognised by your Majesty!{cr}{cr}On this date, by virtue of the power invested in me, I hereby proclaim your promotion to {cr}{cr}MARQUISE{cr}{cr}with all attendant benefits and responsibilities. {cr}{cr}I am delighted by your progress!

Your diligence, dedication, and hard work have been rewarded!{cr}{cr}On this date, by virtue of the power invested in me, I hereby proclaim your promotion to {cr}{cr}SHERIFF{cr}{cr}with all attendant benefits and responsibilities. {cr}{cr}Best of luck with the new title!

root.string: The service is temporarily not available. Please try again later!

Adjusts the graphical quality of displayed units and buildings.{cr}A reduction of this setting can increase the speed of rendering.{cr}The highest setting requires a graphics card with a lot of video memory.
Adjusts the graphical quality of the terrain.{cr}A reduction of this setting can increase the speed of rendering.{cr}The highest setting requires a graphics card with a lot of video memory.

Adjusts the overall graphical quality of the game.{cr}A reduction of this setting can greatly increase the speed of rendering.{cr}The highest setting requires a pixelshader 2.0 compatible graphics card.

Adjusts the sharpness and accuracy of displayed shadows or disables them completely.{cr}A reduction of this setting can in certain cases greatly increase the speed of rendering.{cr}The highest setting requires a graphics card with a lot of video memory.
High settings reduce the flickering of trees and other semi-transparent objects.{cr}A reduction of this setting can give a moderate increase in the speed of rendering.

You can adjust the quality of animations here.{cr}A reduction of this setting can slightly increase the speed of rendering.{cr}Medium and high settings require a pixelshader 2.0 compatible graphics card.
Adjusts the quality and accuracy of displayed reflections or disable them completely.{cr}A reduction of this setting can increase the speed of rendering.

Highest settings show hidden units using the player's colour.{cr}Medium settings show hidden units in white.{cr}Lowest settings do not show any hidden units.{cr}A reduction of this setting can increase the speed of rendering.
Change screen resolution. A lower resolution can vastly improve performance.
Specify aspect ratio of your display.
Change degree of antialiasing.{cr}Higher settings improve image quality but require more video memory and decrease the speed of rendering.
Change degree of anisotropic filtering.{cr}Higher settings improve image quality but require more video memory and may decrease the speed of rendering.
Adjust the amount of visible grass.{cr}A reduction of this setting can increase the speed of rendering.
You can adjust the games master volume level here.
This control allows you to set the sound volume for sound effects in the world like battle sounds and working sounds.
This control allows you to set the sound volume for the user interface.
This control allows you to set the sound volume for all voices during the game, like spoken quest information and messages.
This control allows you to set the sound volume for background ambient sounds, like birds chirping.
This control allows you to set the sound volume for the music during the game.
Choose the right sound provider with this control.
If this checkbox is enabled you are using the high quality sound effects. For high quality sounds your machine should have at least 1 GB memory.
Check this box if you want subtitled videos and spoken texts.
Controls both the scrolling when moving the mouse pointer to the edge of the screen and using the cursor keys to scroll.
Controls the speed with which turning the mouse wheel zooms in and out.
Enable or disable scrolling the map when the mouse pointer is moved to the edge of the screen.
You have been disconnected because someone else used the same username or CD-key!

This key is used to define the number of territories to be claimed. The final string will be concatenated be the number of territories and this text key.{cr}Example: 12 Territories{cr}The space between the number of territories and this text key will be generated by the script.
